description: Takes a provided list of indicator values to search for and finds all related containers. It will produce a list of the related container details.

inputs.description: An indicator value to search on, such as a file hash or IP address. To search on all indicator values in the container, use "*".
inputs.name: value_list

inputs.description: The minimum number of similar indicator records that a container must have to be considered "related." An invalid input will default to 1 with a debug message
inputs.name: minimum_match_count

inputs.description: Filters out any containers with this status
inputs.name: filter_out_status

inputs.description: The container to run indicator analysis against. Supports container object or container_id. This container will also be excluded from the results for related_containers.
inputs.name: container

outputs.description: The unique id of the related container
The number of indicators matched to the related container
The status of the related container e.g. new, open, closed
The type of the related container, e.g. default or case
The name of the related container
True or False if the related container is already included in a case
